data.title: Bengal Capital
data.meta_description:
Bengal Capital | 783 followers on LinkedIn. Aligning Incentives Around Opportunity | Bengal Capital is a team of early cannabis investors and founders who have been immersed in the industry since 2010. We are now focused on applying our previous experience to a concentrated set of cannabis special situation opportunities that involve dislocations between price and value as well as company-specific catalysts.

The Bengal Capital team is distributed between Los Angeles, Chicago, Phoenix, and Seattle.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Bengal Capital is a team of early cannabis investors and founders who have been immersed in the industry since 2010. We are now focused on applying our previous experience to a concentrated set of cannabis special situation opportunities that involve dislocations between price and value as well as company-specific catalysts. The Bengal Capital team is distributed between Los Angeles, Chicago, Phoenix, and Seattle. For more information, please complete and submit the form by clicking the "contact us" link above.

Website

https://www.bengalcap.com/

External link for Bengal Capital

Industry

Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals

Specialties

venture capital, cannabis, seed investing, private equity, family office, angel investing, advising, and funding
